amendment.description: To eliminate the funding for the Advanced Technology Program and increase the funding available for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, community oriented policing service, and State and local law enforcement assistance.

action.text: Amendment SA 1648 proposed by Senator Coburn.
Motion to table amendment SA 1648 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 29. Record Vote Number: 230.
